dmca.title: Beaniebaby.com Ty'ed up?
dmca.body:
Dear [private]:

We are litigation counsel for Ty Inc., the manufacturer of BEANIE BABIES, BEANIE BUDDIES, TEENIE BEANIE BABIES, and PILLOW PALS plush toys. As you are undoubtedly aware, Ty Inc. has created and extensively marketed and sold its distinctive line of plush toys throughout the world. The BEANIE BABIES, BEANIE BUDDIES, TEENIE BEANIE BABIES, PILLOW PALS, and TY marks also identify Ty Inc. as the source of its products, and Ty Inc. owns strong and protectable rights in its BEANIE BABIES, BEANIE BUDDIES, TEENIE BEANIE BABIES, PILLOW PALS, and TY marks, and has registered several of these marks in the United States Patent and Trademark Office.

As you are also undoubtedly aware, Ty Inc. owns an extremely popular web site accessible through the domain names BEANIEBABIES.COM and TY.COM. This web site has been accessed over two billion times.

It has recently come to our attention that you registered through InterNIC the Internet web site BEANIEBABY.COM. At this site you are offering for sale the complete set of Ty's BEANIE BABIES plush toy products, as well as Ty's BEANIE BUDDIES plush toy products, its TEENIE BEANIE BABIES plush toy products, its PILLOW PALS plush toy products, and its BEANIE BABY OFFICIAL CLUB MEMBERSHIP KIT. In connection with your sale of these products, you have displayed many pictures of Ty's products, several of which appear to have been copied directly from Ty's web site. On your web site you use the mark COOLBEANS, in connection with a
